SpinRequest

Request Songs or Hypes from DJs & Hosts

Request songs and shoutouts directly from DJs, Hypemen seamlessly at clubs, events, parties, lounges and bars!

DJ, Play My Song!

SpinRequest Makes You the Party Hero

Turn the Fun to your tune!

No more begging the DJ for your favorite song. Take charge with SpinRequest! Request your jams live and get the party grooving to your beat.

Steal the spotlight

Request hype shouts from DJs and Hypemen, Get your name out there and be the centre of attention without grabbing the mic!.

Make Memories that Matter

Birthdays, anniversaries, apology missions - make any celebration unforgettable. Request a special song for your friends and loved ones, and show them you care with the perfect soundtrack to the moment.

How it works

STEP 1
Find Your DJ or Host

Look for the DJ you want to request from at the event, or scan their unique QR code.

STEP 2
Request a Song or Hype

Search for your favorite song title or enter your hype details and your name

STEP 3
Finalize your order

See the price set by the DJ for your request (some DJs offer free requests!). Confirm your order and payment method.

STEP 4
Hear Your Songs & Hypes

Relax and enjoy! We'll notify you once the DJ plays your song or delivers your hype shoutout. If your request is rejected, you'll get an immediate refund.

Level Up Your Gigs & Get Paid

Turn requests to revenue

Monetize your sets by charging for song requests and hype shouts. Set your own prices and maximize your earning potential!

Engaged Crowd, Seamless Flow

Keep your audience hyped by letting them take centre stage with requests. SpinRequest streamlines the process, making it easy to manage requests without interrupting your flow. Focus on delivering an exceptional performance while the party stays pumped.

Grow Your Fan Base

Get discovered by a wider audience! SpinRequest allows you to build your following, attracting new fans who appreciate your interaction and crowd control.
